input-field.name: klaviyoListForSubscribersSync
input-field.label: Klaviyo List name for subscribers sync
input-field.helpText: The name of the Subscribers list in klaviyo where all Shopware 6 subscribers will be added. In case of duplicate names first found list will be used

input-field.name: catalogFeedProductsCount
input-field.label: Klaviyo Catalog Feed Maximum items count
input-field.helpText:
Maximum number of items in the catalog feed which Shopware 6 will provide to the Klaviyo, by default it is 25000 which is an amount allowed by Klaviyo by default.
If you have more than 25000 products please update this configuration value and contact klaviyo support in order to extend this limit on their side.
If this configuration value will be less than products count, then only most recent products will be added to the catalog feed
